mapper.select: select * from extract_point where status like ${status};
mapper.insert: insert into extract_point (name,id_number, occupation, phone_number, address, area, advantage, status) values (#{name},#{idNumber},#{occupation},#{phoneNumber},#{address},#{area},#{advantage},'待审核')
mapper.update: update extract_point set status=#{status} where id=#{pointId};
